MWC.GUI.Swing.Spinner

Class SpinEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • MWC.GUI.Swing.Spinner.SpinEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SpinEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    An event which is used to dispatch information regarding a Spinner being 'spun'. This code is copyright Kevin Mayer (kmayer@layer9.com) 2001 and can be copied and reproduced freely so long as all original comments in the source code remain in tact. Comments may be added but not removed. If you do modify the spinner classes, I would appreciate seeing your modifications (though this is not compulsory). Basically - here's something for all to use!
    Version:
    (RCS: $Revision: 1.1.1.1 $)
    Author:
    Kevin Mayer (kmayer@layer9.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getActionCommand()
      Get the action command of this Spinner that caused this SpinEvent.
      javax.swing.JComponent getComponent()
      Get the component that was 'spun' by the Spinner that caused this event.

      • SpinEvent

        public SpinEvent(java.lang.Object src,
                 java.lang.String cmd,
                 javax.swing.JComponent comp)
        Create a new SpinEvent.
        Parameters:
        src - The source of the event.
        cmd - The action command of the Spinner causing the event.
        comp - The component that the Spinner is 'spinning'.
